effect_entries.effect:
Prevents the target from attempting to use the same move twice in a row.  When the target leaves the field, this effect ends.

If the target is forced to attempt a repeated move due to choice band, choice scarf, choice specs, disable, encore, taunt, only having PP remaining for one move, or any other effect, the target will use struggle instead.  The target is then free to use the forced move next turn, as it didn't use that move this turn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents the target from using the same move twice in a row.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
向对手无理取闹，
令其不能连续２次
使出相同招式。

相手に　いちゃもんを　つけて
同じ　技を　２回連続で
だせなくする。

The user torments and enrages the target, making it
incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

Chi la usa tormenta e fa infuriare il bersaglio,
impedendogli di usare la stessa mossa
due volte di seguito.

Atormenta y enfurece al objetivo, que no puede 
usar dos veces seguidas el mismo movimiento.

Erzürnt das Ziel, um wiederholten Einsatz derselben
Attacke zu verhindern.

Le lanceur irrite l’ennemi pour l’empêcher d’utiliser
la même capacité deux fois de suite.

無理取鬧，
讓對手不能連續２次
使出相同招式。

상대에게 트집을 잡아서
똑같은 기술을 2회 연속으로
쓸 수 없게 한다.

あいてに　いちゃもんを　つけて
おなじ　わざを　２かい　れんぞくで
だせなくする。

相手に　いちゃもんを　つけて
同じ　技を　２回連続で
だせなくする。
